name: Leila Silk Bridal Dress Sash Belt with Buttons - Custom Made to Order
description:
Silk dupioni dress sash with silk covered button up back. Elegant bridal gown sashes. Fashionable custom wedding accessories for brides, bridesmaids and flower girls.

Finish off your ensemble with this sophisticated silk dress sash that features button and loop rear detailing that make this refined accessory especially elegant from behind.

This sweet bridal sash has a timeless, elegant appeal and is a lovely way to define your waist. This beautiful piece features charming hand created silk covered buttons with loop closure. See one you can't walk down the aisle without? Just thing of it as your something new. Sash shown created from Platinum silk dupioni.

Sash will be made within the size ranges listed: 1-3 inches in width, to your custom waist size, up to 36 inches long. If you would like your custom dress sash to be wider and/or longer I would be happy to accommodate your request however this option may incur extra charges due to the additional yardage needed.

Want this made in a different fabric or have other alterations in mind? I'm happy to offer my clients an exceptional level of personalization and each custom accessory is made to be a unique as you are. Feel free to contact me with your thoughts. I'd be happy to find that custom fabric you're looking for, specialty pieces are available but may incur extra charges, please contact for more information. countessa@empressbride.com

I am not responsible for fitting errors due to incorrect measurements being provided. Please contact me with any questions about the fit, if there are any. You may wish to have a seamstress or tailor in your area take the measurements needed.

name: Camellia Silk Ruffle Flower Bridal Shrug
description: Pin It Custom silk ruffle Victorian cropped bridal jacket. Elegant bridal shrugs and boleros made to order. Fashionable custom wedding accessories for brides and bridesmaids. This polished accessory echos the understated elegance of an era where glamour was at it's peek. With it's crisp tailoring and ladylike neckline this fabulous shrug is perfect for incorporating elements of the past into your wedding day or other special event. Cover your shoulders with this sweet little confection all wrapped up with ruffle detailing. Bold, whimsical and flirty this darling silk shrug features a sculpted asymmetrically ruched collar in a fanciful floral shape with decorative Swarovski crystal bead detailing. Finished off with elegant 3/4 sleeves. This decadent shrug is an ideal way to dress up any outfit and put a romantic twist to your favorite attire. Shown in Navy silk shantung. Listing is for a custom shrug created in your color choice of silk dupioni. I'm always happy to search my suppliers for that special shade of silk to match your gown or to coordinate with your wedding palette. Want this made in a different fabric or have other alterations in mind? I'm happy to offer my clients an exceptional level of personalization and each custom garment is made to be a unique as you are. Feel free to contact me with your thoughts and ideas. I'd be happy to find that custom fabric you're looking for, specialty pieces are available but may incur extra charges, please contact for more information. countessa@empressbride.com This shrug can be made to one of the sizes on my size chart or to your custom measurements (preferred). For custom garments your actual measurements will be needed, when you have placed your order you will be sent instructions on how to take as well as what measurements are needed. Please note, I obviously cannot be responsible for fitting errors due to incorrect measurements being provided. Please contact me with any questions about the fit, if there are any. You may wish to have a seamstress or tailor in your area take the measurements needed. A mock up to test the fit of the measurements you have supplied is also available upon request. Many thanks to the fabulous bride and her photographer for allowing me to share these stunning images with you. Brides: Megan Photography: Heather Nan Photography www.heathernanphoto.com http://heathernanphotography.blogspot.com/

name: Alyne Silk Victorian Custom Bridal Shrug
description: Pin It Ivory (off white) silk ruffle Victorian cropped bridal jacket. Elegant bridal shrugs and boleros. Fashionable custom wedding accessories for brides and bridesmaids. Be a vision of romance in this timeless, elegant design. Express your own sense of style in this fabulous shrug with luxe details from the crimped ruffled collar, tailored sleeves and silhouette shaped to flatter the feminine physique. Add a playful touch to your wedding day ensemble with romantic ruffles and lustrous pearl detailing. Show off your frill-seeking vibe with this darling silk shrug with ruffle sculpted collar that features a handmade silk rosette, Swarovski pearl beading detail and finished off with a wisp of delicate ostrich feathers. name: Marlene Custom Silk Wedding Dress Sash with Roses
description: Pin It Custom silk dupioni dress sash with frayed flower rosettes. Elegant bridal gown sashes. Fashionable custom wedding accessories for brides, bridesmaids and flower-girls. The big moments of your wedding are important but it's often the little things that make it unforgettable. This finishing touch is as versatile as they come. Utilize an irresistible complimentary neutral that goes with anything or amp up a pale gown with a splash of color! This tripe bloom bridal sash with an timeless, vintage appeal is a lovely way to define your waist. This beautiful piece features three hand made distressed silk rosettes with rhinestone centers and the dress sash features tapered ends. See a style you can't walk down the aisle without? Just thing of it as your something new. Created from you color combination choice in silk dupioni. Sash will be made up to 3 inches wide and 125 inches. If you would like your custom dress sash to be wider and/or longer I would be happy to accommodate your request however this option may incur extra charges due to the additional yardage needed. What this made in a different fabric or have other alterations in mind? I'm happy to offer my clients an exceptional level of personalization and each custom accessory is made to be a unique as you are. Feel free to contact me with your thoughts. I'd be happy to find that custom fabric you're looking for, specialty pieces are available but may incur extra charges, please contact for more information. countessa@empressbride.com

name: Gia Custom Wedding Dress Silk Bridal Belt Sash
description: Pin It Custom silk dupioni dress sash made to measure. Elegant bridal gown sashes. Fashionable custom wedding accessories for brides, bridesmaids and flower girls. The big moments of your wedding are important but it's often the little things that make it unforgettable. This finishing touch is as versatile as they come. Utilize an irresistible complimentary neutral that goes with anything or amp up a pale gown with a splash of color! This lovely bridal sash has a timeless, vintage appeal and is a lovely way to define your waist. This beautiful piece will be created to your specifications for a personalized accessory with the perfect fit. See a style you can't walk down the aisle without? Just thing of it as your something new! Created from your color choice in silk dupioni. Sash will be made within the size ranges listed below. If you would like your custom dress sash to be wider and/or longer I would be happy to accommodate your request however this option may incur extra charges due to the additional yardage needed. Please note my dress sashes are of the utmost quality in construction and meticulously handcrafted by me so please feel free to contact me with any questions. The actual waistband portion of this piece is completely customizable in length and created in one continuous piece for a seam free look on the waistline. The waist band is also properly reinforced to lay flat, wrinkle and gather free. Each of the side tails on the sash are also created in one continuous piece for a seam free look and can be either squared or angled off depending on your own personal preference.
